interval-0.1.0.0: A library for doing computations with polynomials with interval coefficients

A library for doing computations with polynomials with interval coefficients

Modules

  • ImageWriter Module for writing to ppm images.
  • Interval Intervals which can be manipulated algebraically -
  • IntervalNewton Code to find zeros of a polynomial by running Interval Newton
  • KDTree A simple KD Tree.

  • Polynomial General polynomials which can be differentiated -
  • PolynomialParser A parser to parse polynomials in string form
